net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader

Interface TextResourceReader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResourceReader
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ServletContextResourceReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseServletContextResourceReader, CssSmartSpritesResourceReader, FileSystemResourceReader, PathPrefixedServletContextResourceReader, ResourceGeneratorReaderWrapper

    public interface TextResourceReader
extends ResourceReader
    This interface is implemented by objects which can read text resources. (JS or CSS)
    Author:
    Ibrahim Chaehoi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Reader getResource(String resourceName)
      Retrieves a single resource.
      Reader getResource(String resourceName, boolean processingBundle)
      Retrieves a single resource.

    • Method Detail

      • getResource

        Reader getResource(String resourceName)
        Retrieves a single resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceName - String Name of the resource.
        Returns:
        a reader for the resource

      • getResource

        Reader getResource(String resourceName,
                 boolean processingBundle)
        Retrieves a single resource.
        Parameters:
        resourceName - String Name of the resource.
        processingBundle - the flag indicating that we are currently processing the bundles
        Returns:
        the reader to the resource
